name: Bug Fighting Farm
description:
A GAME MADE BY
Xariel Janečka - Sound Design and Music -  Sound Cloud - Blog
Armen  DerNersesian - Models, textures, and Art
Jordan Kozlowski - Programming, design, UI - Itch Page

GAME
Survive for as long as you can. When you defeat a wave of bugs quickly you will receive a bonus. If you skip the Idle phase early, you will receive a bonus. Water your plants to restore their health and keep the fight going.

CONTROLS
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Aim direction
Left Mouse - Shoot
Right Mouse - Water
Escape - Pause
R - Skip

KNOWN BUGS

  • Unfortunately the Web version of the game was riddled with bugs and had to be pulled. 
  • Unable to test linux or OSX versions
  • Sometimes in later rounds, it'll break and skip a round, or end to quickly and start another.
